name: Call of NRP
description:
Just a point-and-click game for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1, its my frist one, so roast me... or not, its up to you))) Anyway i had a lot of fun creating this.

For control you need only your mouse(LMB), look for items to click, then progress through 3 chapters.

Enjoy it, or pretend to, and thanks to all who would play)
